description:
The Ginyu Force has arrived on Planet Namek!  Now, Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan must form an uneasy alliance as they stand face to face with five of the fiercest warriors in the universe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku se aproxima! Os temíveis homens de Freeza
Gokuu ga Daisekkin! Freezer no Houimou o Buchi Yabure
โกคูมาถึงแล้ว! ฝ่าวงล้อมสุดโหดของฟรีสเซอร์
悟空が大接近! フリーザの包囲網をぶち破れ
